item.title: Coding at Agent-Speed
item.author: xieydd@gmail.com (xieydd)
item.description: I recently built a security product using Code Agentsâ€”an LLM Security Insight platform based on eBPF + PostgreSQL. The tech stack was eclectic: eBPF, React, Go, Docker, Kubernetes, PostgreSQL, DuckDB. I was a complete beginner at React and eBPF, but the project shipped in a month. VS Code -> Cursor -> Gemini -> VS Code -> Codex -> VS Code -> Claude Code -> GLM -> VS Code I'm a long-time VS Code user.
